thread.section_title: Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best Hotel in New York -
thread.title_full: Best Hotel in New York - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Wayne B
title: Best Hotel in New York -
text: If travelling to New York and you want to stay in a beautiful boutique hotel which is right in the centre of Times Square then you cannot go past Casablanca. The rooms are fantastic, the staff are so helpful and friendly and it is great value considering the location. And the all inclusive continental breakfast and wine / cheese tastings are an added bonus. A special mention for Gene, one of the doormen. Very helpful and a very nice guy. My daughter and I enjoyed our 9 night stay at Casablanca and look forward to returning in the not too distant future.
